description: Simple html doc that has a link to an exploit

customAttributes.name: payload
customAttributes.description: Location of the url relative to host where the link in the phish will point. eg /misc/shell.exe.

customAttributes.name: downloadAs
customAttributes.description: Name the file will be downloaded by default as on the phish target.

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of file to be created, can be full path or just a name
